detalle_indicador: Percentage of population caring for children at home (households with children only).
disclaimer: The reference population includes persons aged 15 to 24 in households with children aged 0 to 18. The series may present jumps due to methodological changes in the surveys (see methodological documents). Source: GenLAC (CEDLAS).
